tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** *****  ** *** **** ****** ** ***** **** *** *** ****** *********  I underwent treatment for dental implant and root canal. I was thoroughly communicated the line of treatment at all point of time.  All the treatment was done excellently and I never felt pain throughout the treatment, which normally happens during dental treatment. He is very  commited to patient care , very polite and expert in treatment of all dental problems including implant .   The best clinic for all dental problems. 
My sincere thanks and regards to Doctor Amogh for the treatment done excellently.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Amog and his dental clinic has left a lasting impression on me with his amazing ways of making the patient comfortable. Visits to the dentist is the last thing in my mind and I kept postponing my treatment as I am uncomfortable even at the thought of the drilling and the sensitivity. But dr. Amog was so gentle and his professional approach put me at ease. I strongly recommend dr. Amog to anyone who is looking for a trusted dentist.

review:
Thoroughly satisfied by the professional yet friendly attitude of Dr. Amogh Tanwar. Visited him for the root canal treatment(RCT) and got impressed by the detailed attention he paid to my problems which he handled very carefully and to my utmost satisfaction.
The thing which I feel segregate him from the rest is his nature to pay heed to your queries and problems, he not only listens to all your problems but give proper suggestions as well.
In short, if you are looking for your a family doctor like treatment head straight to Dr. Amogh Tanwar's Clinic
reply_text: Thanks for such kind words, regards Dr Amogh

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Amogh made me understand the issue in hand, and had advised me to undergo a tooth extraction, he was really friendly that he even said that if I am nervous we can keep the procedure for some other day, however I continued since this was reassurance from his side, goes on to show that he is concerned with a patient's anxiety and nervousness as well. During the procedure also, I was a little anxious so he asked me not to be nervous, made me look in his eyes for reassurance that everything is fine. The procedure was complete in around 20-25 mins, it was a painless procedure (thank god) and later he advised me on precautions to be taken for the next 3 days. 

Thank you Doctor.
reply_text: Wishing you speedy recovery, thanks for such kind words, regards Dr Amogh
